survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from participants of professional certification programs to improve the quality and effectiveness of future offerings.

questions.question_text: Which professional certification program did you recently complete?
questions.client_notes: Ensure the list includes major certifications relevant to your audience. Consider adding an 'Other' option with a text field for write-ins.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a dropdown menu for the answer options. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: Which professional certification program did you recently complete?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the certification program?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement. Ensure the scale is balanced with a neutral midpoint.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the certification program?

questions.question_text: How relevant was the content of the certification program to your professional needs?
questions.client_notes: This question helps assess the practical applicability of the program content. Use a 5-point scale for granularity.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How relevant was the content of the certification program to your professional needs?

questions.question_text: Which aspects of the certification program did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: This multi-choice question helps identify the most valued components of the program. Include an 'Other' option for additional feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: Which aspects of the certification program did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How prepared did you feel for the certification exam after completing the program?
questions.client_notes: This question assesses the program's effectiveness in preparing participants for the certification exam. Use a 5-point scale.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How prepared did you feel for the certification exam after completing the program?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the certification program?
questions.client_notes: This open-ended question allows participants to provide detailed feedback on potential improvements.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text box for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the certification program?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this certification program to a colleague?
questions.client_notes: This question measures the Net Promoter Score (NPS) for the program. Use a 5-point scale.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this certification program to a colleague?

questions.question_text: Did you encounter any technical difficulties during the online components of the program?
questions.client_notes: This question helps identify any technical issues that may need addressing. Use a simple 3-point scale.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: Did you encounter any technical difficulties during the online components of the program?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the accessibility of the program materials (e.g., ease of access, mobile compatibility)?
questions.client_notes: This question assesses the user-friendliness of the program materials. Use a 5-point scale.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How would you rate the accessibility of the program materials (e.g., ease of access, mobile compatibility)?

questions.question_text: Would you be interested in additional advanced-level certification programs from the same provider?
questions.client_notes: This question gauges interest in future offerings. Use a simple 4-point scale.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: Would you be interested in additional advanced-level certification programs from the same provider?
